page.title: 15A Child's Typical Day
page.content: I get up at 7.30am and have my breakfast of cornflakes,or toast and marmalade.At 8.30am,our Dad fetches the car and drives us to the nearest village,East Stockwith.There we catch the school bus at 8.35am.We get to school at 8.55am.Mr.Greig,the Deputy headteacher blows a whistle at 9.00am.Then we line up and go into school.After the register we do Maths until playtime at 10.30am.From 10.45am until lunchtime we do English:creative writing,language work and reading.Then we have dinner(I have a packed lunch).In the afternoon we do different things like netball,football ,art and craft,chess, drama,music and needlework.We go home at 3.30pm.I have my tea at about 6.00pm.Then we watch television until 9.00pm when I go to bed.
